headlines.description: Chelsea boosted their chances of a top-four finish by beating Brighton and Hove Albion 3-0 at home on Wednesday.

video.headline: Loftus-Cheek curls in beauty for Chelsea's third

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC ONE PLAY (Loftus-Cheek curls in beauty for Chelsea's third) 2019/04/03 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea beat Brighton to bolster UCL hopes

headlines.description: Manchester City returned to the top of the table as goals from Kevin De Bruyne and Leroy Sane gave them a 2-0 home win over struggling Cardiff.

video.headline: Man City canter back to top of the table

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC HIGHLIGHT (Man City canter back to top of the table) 2019/4/3 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Man City back on top after routine victory

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur marked their long-awaited homecoming with a 2-0 win over Crystal Palace in the first Premier League game at their new stadium.

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC ONE PLAY (Eriksen's goal puts away Palace) 2019/4/3 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Son scores first at Spurs' new venue in vital win
